org.openimaj.vis.general

Class AxisRenderer3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.vis.general.AxisRenderer<float[]>
      • org.openimaj.vis.general.AxisRenderer3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataUnitsTransformer<float[],Double,Double>

    public class AxisRenderer3D
extends AxisRenderer<float[]>
implements DataUnitsTransformer<float[],Double,Double>
    A class for drawing rulers in a 3D world. // TODO : This could be made more efficient using DisplayLists.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
